Mangle::Sound::OpenAL_SndFile_Factory

Mangle::Sound::OpenAL_SndFile_Factory Class Reference

#include <openal_sndfile.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 OpenAL_SndFile_Factory ()

Detailed Description

A InputFilter that adds libsnd decoding to OpenAL. libsndfile supports most formats except MP3.
